np-coburg.de.105627.15: “From our point of view, hygiene conditions in the workplace and housing conditions in particular need to be closely monitored.

infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50+1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended that you think about the abolition of the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: “German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates completed facts,” Grindel told the “Bild am Sonntag”.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: “The 50+1 rules do not work for the clubs that are most likely to become Bavaria and Dortmund dangerous anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, it is not possible to avoid the debate whether it is not necessary to facilitate investor involvement for clubs that want to break into this phalanx”.
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he doubts whether there is a willingness to allow majority participation in the German Football League that is prohibited by the 50+1 rule in the Bundesliga.
infranken.de.309597.7: “It remains a legal risk to pull investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European single market,” said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB head sees the danger that “attempts to create more competitive balance in the Bundesliga end only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but do not lead to more tension in the championship”.
infranken.de.309597.9: Even a uniform distribution of TV money will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: “FC Bayern generates sales of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund from 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences are therefore immense among the top three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million,” said the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: With a view to the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: “Unfortunately, there were people who noticed this error and pierced it to the press instead of talking to me about it,” Grindel said about accepting an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: “This has already been very concerned with me in human terms.”
infranken.de.309597.16: He received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: “I committed a compliance violation and it was right to draw the consequences from it,” said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: “I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and unruthlessly.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people in the DFB knew about it”.
infranken.de.309597.20: He never “made a secret from the gift,” assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: “You might call it naive, at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption.”
faz.79601.1: “Black Lives Matter”: Injured and a Dead
faz.79601.2: The protests against police violence in the United States have sharpened again due to Donald Trump's deployment of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: Clashes between demonstrators and police officers occurred in different cities on Saturday.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville, while 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, a person was killed by shots while a demonstration train just crossed an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Clashes had previously occurred again in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officials, used tear gas on Saturday night and forcibly assaulted protesters.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds, partly armed demonstrators marched through Louisville in Kentucky on Saturday and demanded that those responsible for Breonna Taylor's death should be held responsible for Breonna Taylor's death.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville in March.
faz.79601.10: The raid was aimed at someone else who didn't live there at all and no drugs were found either.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group called themselves an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to the station NBC, they were taken to hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in danger of their lives.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counterdemonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot dead and died in the course of a “Black Lives Matter” demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police, according to their own statements, took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided any details on the circumstances of the act.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler said, according to the “New York Times,” he was “inconsolable and stunned” about what happened, like many in the city.
faz.79601.20: Protesters also had clashes with the police in the American metropolis Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction trucks in front of a youth prison, and the police used blending grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the “Seattle Times,” 16 people were arrested for resistance to police officers or bodily harm.
faz.79601.23: A courthouse was set on fire in the city of Oakland, California.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, shot down fireworks, and dazzled police officers with lasers, Oakland police reported late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.25: The fire was quickly extinguished again.
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: Police reported that one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court there too and a fire was set, as the police said.

morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 corona cases in Spanish second division Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: Spanish football second division, CF Fuenlabrada, sliders ever deeper into the crisis due to a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew into the city of A Coruña for a game on July 20th despite the first corona cases, one low blow has followed the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, one was hospitalized, as the club announced.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name southwest of Madrid still had the chance to reach the ascent playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now there is even a threat of relegation into the Second League B-Group.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last moment, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible public health offense, while the top sports authority CSD is considering the club's forced descent.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: Players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: “They did not receive a fresh towel or gel until the sixth day of quarantine,” wrote the sports newspaper “AS”.
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show players hanging underwear and club clothes to dry in their rooms in the hotel after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen had also not been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: Neither is it good nor sufficient, wrote “AS”.
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, rejected the accusation of having deliberately endangered public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The corona rules established by the football federation were not violated, stressed the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, as the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper “Marca” reported.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Prior to departure, there were four infected people until July 19, but they were all isolated and did not travel along.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Just before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were retested.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the corona test was positive for “five or six” other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was canceled 60 minutes before the kickoff, said Tebas Llanas.

azonline.de.86610.1: Cycle professional Tony Martin: career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - Seven-time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: “I am currently setting out the framework conditions with the team, how and in what form it could continue,” said the 35-year-old to the “Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung”.
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: “Get back on the bike quickly.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: what if”.
azonline.de.86610.10: The cyclist admitted that there are certainly aspects that he is becoming increasingly difficult to deal with.
azonline.de.86610.11: “But it was good for me to remember what I have in cycling and how much fun I enjoy it based on the corona time”.
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist is entering the competition again at the Tour de l'Ain (August 5 to 9).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets this weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the bike tour ends fatally.

nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: It was unclear why the car was in the opposite lane at first.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old hit a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he went downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: He hit the carriage in a left-hand turn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of an accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve inmates of the carriage, one man was severely injured and a man slightly injured, as the police reported.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road the night of Sunday and was run over by a 42-year-old car driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to police suspicion, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The motorist could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district), a 57-year-old biker hit a car head-on on Saturday in a right-hand turn despite emergency braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of an accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, while the remaining three people in the car remained unharmed.

nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on guardrails and defusing dangerous curves.

nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: “The number of motorized two-cyclists killed decreased by around 28 percent compared to 2011.”

freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurters lost the round of 16 against Basel in their own stadium at 0:3.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, announced by the Ministry of Economic Affairs in Buenos Aires on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: “This would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair,” a statement said.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: “While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors.”
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: This is why Argentina is asking its private creditors to waive part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If there is no agreement, the country is threatened with state bankruptcy again.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth payment default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Lenders recently demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its latest offer and is not ready to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in a serious financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was more than 50 percent recently.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: Experts expect economic strength to fall by around ten percent for the current year.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina did not settle interest receivables of $503 million and therefore slipped into a limited payment default.
pnp.de.390078.2: “It's going great” - Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws this conclusion after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very fast: in mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she will succeed Lutz Feller at the Notary Office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the lawyer with a doctorate started working, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: “However, I still have to arrive privately,” she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: The short lead time was, of course, not enough to move the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden completely, reports the native Dingolfingerin.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works as a judge at the district court in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave on short notice in order to provide care for the two daughters (3½ and 1½ years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she also has an overnight accommodation with her parents in Dingolfing for the time being, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighbouring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course long been familiar to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During local visits with her family in recent months, she found out again: “Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town”.
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she made the race in the vacancy selection process.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her homeland of Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship period and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, among others, in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Unterallgäu and Regensburg - she also took her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she went on parental leave, followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representative services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to Lutz Feller's approaching retirement, she saw the right time for full career re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over vacation representation in the notarial office in the future, has completely taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and has a praise for the firm's team right away: “It's going great!”
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-established processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private place of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of kindergarten or nativity squares, she has already contacted a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And everything works out as desired, she hopes to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging tracks in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to launch league with a maximum of 15,000 viewers
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: “Due to the distance regulation, which is mandatory to comply, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 viewers,” Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told “Tagesspiegel”.
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city captures just over 81,000 spectators in Bundesliga games.
an-online.de.487062.5: In last season's ghost games caused by the corona pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB hopes that in addition to normal spectators, some of the approximately 4000 places in the hospitality area can also be opened again: “It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues break away completely”.
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing corona crisis, everyone is currently “well advised to take a stable page length first”.
an-online.de.487062.8: “If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people are on short-time working in Germany alone, then the need for entertainment is limited,” explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing from Dortmund praised the BVB professionals for their salary partial waiver, which is meant to help overcome the crisis: “Of course, players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than when we put 100 people working in merchandising on short-time work.”
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packerl butter, just three tablespoons of blood throughout his body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies taken care of at the Graz Children's Clinic every year.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweight weights with less than one kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, intestines, nor muscles are fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could hurt the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they're so tiny they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers specially made for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in voice - “and how,” Berndt Urlesberger smiles.
kurier.at.204565.9: “Even though they don't scream as loud as big babies, of course.”

schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teresa Nar was pleased with the enrichment of teaching.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even though everyone involved agreed at the end that direct encounters in theatre and stage rooms would offer additional stimuli, the theatre also sees the potential for contact with schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: “If we further improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting addition to gaming operations,” said director Winfried Tobias.

mz-web.de.376296.1: “Gone by the Wind”: film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural death in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic “Gone by the Wind” (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo as a child of British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: Austrian theatre man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia by Shakespeare's “Midsummer Night's Dream”.
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and brought them out big alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar starring “To Each His Own”.
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was screened in Germany under the title “Mutterherz”.
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later, the award as best actress came in William Wyler's “The Heiress”.
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in “Der Dark Spiegel” and “Die Schlangengrube”.
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her in 1952 for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel “My Cousin Rachel”.
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play was a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: She played lullaby for a corpse with her long-time friend Bette Davis.
mz-web.de.376296.16: The marriage with writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) resulted in son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.

paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz ejection from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of “fig leaf”
paz-online.de.95211.2: From the FDP's perspective, the exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is just a “fig leaf” and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: “The AfD is the parliamentary arm of right-wing extremists in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the Radical iceberg in the AfD,” said FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser to the news agency dpa in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Tribunal of the AfD confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing, which was decided by the majority of the Federal Executive Board in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD Group in the Brandenburg State Parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: “If the AfD was really about consistently removing right-wing extremists from their party, officials like Björn Höcke and his followers would have long been excluded,” said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: “However, there is no political will in the AfD because right-wing extremism is now part of the party”.
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU Secretary General Markus Blume said similarly: “The fact that Andreas Kalbitz now remains excluded says nothing and does not change anything,” he told the “World on Sunday”.
paz-online.de.95211.10: “Rather, it speaks volumes of how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the middle of the AfD”.
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume expects the AfD to land below five percent again in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: “The days of the AfD in parliaments are numbered”.
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the officially dissolved “wing” around Thuringian AfD state and group chairman Björn Höcke; constitutional protection classifies stroening as “secured right-wing extremist aspiration.”
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD Federal Executive Board kicked Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason he stated, Kalbitz did not specify earlier membership in the now banned far-right “home office German Youth” (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left-wing parliamentary group in the Brandenburg State Parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Tribunal did not change the character of the AfD: “The wolf only ate chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, whether with or without calbitz”.
paz-online.de.95211.19: This decision neither weakens the federal party nor does the right wing be weakened.
paz-online.de.95211.20: “The maneuver of the Meuthen troupe is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: You want to avoid further observation by constitutional protection and try to get through under the radar,” said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: “The AfD is not getting rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: Ejection doesn't change anything yet,” commented Brandenburg SPD general secretary Erik Stohn about the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: “Here, the AfD National Association and the faction remained their right-wing leader to this day”.
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil law against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Tribunal.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: Wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, said network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for transferring North Sea electricity to the mainland and forwarding it through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: Wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed another 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North and Baltic Seas comes to 13.73 TWh, compared with a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of the total wind flow in Germany; that's about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms provide higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity by calculation.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to rise to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: “In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in expanding offshore grid connections by then,” said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms cannot exploit their capacity even at sea, but reach around 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, North Sea wind turbines produce around 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which is equivalent to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.

dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windberg Festival is not taking place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital cancelled the three-day festival scheduled in September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had visited this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: “We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for the participants - hoped until the last minute,” said Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (unparty).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: “But ultimately, as organizers, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people here.”
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had flowed to the festival grounds and into the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current corona protection regulation could not have been observed.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so strong that there wouldn't be much left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organizational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off to next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: The city of Freital will then celebrate its 100th anniversary with, among other things, the Winter Mountain Festival from May 7 to 9, 2021 and Saxony Day from September 10 to 12, 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: dressage Olympic champion Werth in Achleiten not to beat
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg came to four wins this weekend at four starts.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After she won a Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz to prelude, she was not beaten in the Grand Prix Special and Freestyle on Sunday either.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On Sunday, Werth clearly prevailed against Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen on the 15-year-old mare Weihegold.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: In the freestyle, too, the German on Quantaz was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer on Saturday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz, it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all important four tests at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled there for August 14 to 16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The Worms University continues to go into the air: The “DFS German Air Traffic Control” donates a professorship for “Air Traffic Management”.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and starts in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, it is possible to start studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This allows you to train twice as many students as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities are utilized evenly both at the university and at the DFS Air Traffic Traffic Traffic Academy.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on setting up and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students have been in Air Traffic Management as part of their training as air traffic controller at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experience of DFS has been very positive, and the students' achievements are outstanding.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training significantly contributes to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: “In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we are firmly expecting air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: To continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel,” says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, CEO of DFS when signing the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: “For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, cross-disciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpin our attractiveness as an employer”.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences, also underlines this: “The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the already existing cooperation with DFS German Air Traffic Control as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's program Air Traffic Management”.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German air traffic control is both the motivation and obligation for the University of Worms to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future fields of aviation.

mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to check other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The corona crisis brought conditions to light again in parts of the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will it stick with it?

mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of work contracts and temporary workers there is to be banned.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told dpa: “Stay away from a general restriction on work contracts and temporary workers if you don't want to completely stall the economy”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: For example, work contracts are the basis for their added value at the customer for large areas of trade, construction and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: “The misconduct of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument.”
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: “My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: “When an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, it is a normal work contract”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work unconstitutional in its industry alone.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It cannot be explained why, in the future, labor law should apply different from sausage when portioning and packaging cheese, as reported by the “Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung” (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: Consumer prices would therefore rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product in the event of a ban.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Health and Safety Administration, often Eastern European employees from contracting companies worked in the industry 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.21: They often didn't have a break.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were retained for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also found that the situation with employee accommodation was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively sharp law came into force for the meat industry as early as 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were bypassed by “tricky constructions”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: “Now it needs to be fundamentally cleaned up.”
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: “In the Occupational Health and Safety Act, which we intend to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, also includes measures that not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher test rates for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for community accommodation”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to dpa includes amendments to the Act on the Safeguarding of Workers' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Health and Safety Act.

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all threatened penalties and court rulings, drivers continue to accelerate in countless illegal races on Baden-Württemberg roads: The police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races last year and the first four months of this year.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no benchmarks for the years before, but the speeders are making judicial authorities increasingly work: Public prosecution offices between Konstanz and Mannheim conducted a total of 155 investigations for illegal races in 2018, with 252 years later, and 151 in the current year until the beginning of June.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as evidenced by the Ministry of the Interior to a request from the Landtag SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they would have escaped from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: German men between the ages of 18 and 60 were mainly behind the wheel.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and also asked to cash register: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed and 15 imprisonment sentences have been issued since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: But there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers were more sensitive than before because of the many tragic accidents and processes of past years and showed more frequently, said a department spokesperson.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: Highway 8 is particularly popular with racers, motorists keep slowing down traffic there in order to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, and three months earlier, there were even 18 drivers on the A8 at Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police even register more races on the A81 than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: A speed limit tries to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and upbeat sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates because drivers are moving to Germany for the lawn due to the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighbouring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit cannot be reduced to a few distances: “With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways,” says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD state parliament group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: “The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there at 200 kilometers per hour or more”.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of enlightenment or image campaigns: “Anyone who puts themselves beyond all rules in this way and not only puts their own lives at stake, but also the lives of other road users, is hardly accessible with reason”.

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: That's not enough for ADAC, on the other hand: “We assume that speed limits will not be deterred by speed limits,” says Holger Bach, Head of Transport and Environment at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: The high-speed test of strength often becomes painful and momentous serious: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people died in the races nationwide, two of them non-participants in a nightly crash in Stuttgart's city centre and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have delivered a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, bounced against a garden wall and remained on its side, and the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 more people have been injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: However, tougher penalties are not necessary, according to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl: “Legislative need for action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races harder is not seen,” says the Ministry of Interior Paper.

rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence during demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Netanyahu's head of government are getting more and more intense.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: Violent clashes occurred during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police violently took action against participants in a demonstration against right-wing conservative head of government Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday night in Jerusalem.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Police spokesman Mickey Rosenfeld said twelve people were arrested for participating in riots.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used water launchers, among other things, to resolve the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6000 people gathered near Netanyahu's office on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew in horns and called Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants of a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site “ynet” reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv because it is suspected of having sprayed pepper spray from a moving car onto roadside demonstrators.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The protester had been slightly injured on his neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv recently.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption process against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Netanyahu was also recently criticized for handling the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is presented with rapid easing and a lack of preparation for a second wave of corona.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis has severely hit the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was more than 20 percent recently.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel recently rose to ever new record levels.

rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea closes border city after corona suspected
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to defend against the coronavirus as a “brilliant success”.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting on a suspicion for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official corona suspicion in the country, North Korea completely sealed off a big city out of fear of disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, “the malicious virus could have been introduced into the country,” state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: The state of emergency was imposed for the region around the border city of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership called the highest alert level.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with SARS-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea had not registered a single infection so far and described its defenses as “shining success.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly found in an “outlier” who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person dropped off to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For the time being, there was no confirmation of border crossing within the four kilometre wide and largely mined military buffer zone from South Korea.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, South Korea's military admitted the possibility of illegal border crossing to North Korea as high, according to reports by national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There were investigations on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea, according to its own statements, called an urgent meeting of the Workers' Party's Politburo on Saturday, chaired by ruler Kim Jong Un on suspicion.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: “The dangerous situation in Kaesong could cause a deadly and destructive disaster.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: As a preventive measure, Kim ordered “completely blocking Kaesong and isolating each district and region from others,” it said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The data subject and all people in Kaesong who had had contact with her have been quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The party's central military commission should therefore investigate the “outlier” and the conduct of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that around 300,000 people live in Kaesong.

schwaebische.de.113555.15: The GT Masters will also be holding its first race right there - at the Lausitzring.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From July 31, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: However, Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to series production, knows the track.

schwaebische.de.113555.20: “The Lausitzring has many quick passages that you have to hit optimally in order to be fast”.
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is then turns out in two weeks.

tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane “Hanna” reaches Texas: help made difficult due to corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has hit land in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall now threatened parts of the US state, as the National Hurricane Center told US climate agency NOAA on night through Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The rampant corona pandemic in Texas is making the work of the helpers more difficult, said Abbott, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: “Every hurricane is a huge challenge,” said Abbott according to the newspaper “Houston Chronicle”.
tt.com.149061.8: Looking at the Texas hurricane, he added: “This challenge is complicated and gets worse considering it sweeping through an area that is the state's most affected area by Covid-19.”
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5000 people have so far died in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be careful.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices “we have become accustomed to,” such as wearing masks, said the governor, according to the station CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms were also provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, the need to test for corona in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially been reported only from the coastal city of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, “Hanna” hit the island of Padre Island on land just off the Texan coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the stretch of coast from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm flood warning was first issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while “Hanna” moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, hurricane “Douglas” headed towards Hawaii at wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour during the night on Sunday.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: It is forecast to be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then just below the hurricane threshold as a storm.
tt.com.149061.25: According to a forecast from May, NOAA expected an above-average hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes can be expected, of which up to six very strong hurricanes could become very strong, the authority said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic Ocean, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: Given available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and Caribbean, the probability of a normal season was only 30 percent, and that of a below-average even only ten percent, was said at that time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his government was closely watching the storms and was in contact with the affected states.

salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: As the required number of continents cannot be driven, the FIA must improvise to award the World Cup titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All America races have been canceled, though.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is getting more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The race calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: Three more racetracks were added to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the Nürburgring will be driven in Germany and Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and co. fight for World Cup points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: The 2020 race calendar thus comprises 13 races according to the current status.
salzburg.com.306641.10: “We're happy to continue making great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season,” said Formula 1 boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races will be held in the premier class of motorsport in this exceptional season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to complete its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could still take place at the end of November before the officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations call for races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: The rules of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the award of the World Cup.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even though, as currently planned, will only be driven on two continents, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA intends to award the titles due to the coronavirus pandemic, citing “extraordinary circumstances”.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the oncoming corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: Returning to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: “We're looking forward to being with them again next season,” said Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of America races was particularly criticised in Brazil: “The cancellation was not surprising to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for this,” said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the São Paulo Grand Prix.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The number of infections in São Paulo is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would also not justify rejection.
salzburg.com.306641.28: You are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Bad eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg talked about her encounter with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest of Stephen Colbert's well-known latenight show via video switch and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate-kivist Greta Thunberg was a guest in a popular US latenight show via video switch.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: She talked about her fight against the world's powerful, among other things.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous “evil eye” when she encountered Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the “Fridays For Future” movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: She now talked about her plans in the future in a well-known latenight show and her encounter with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight presenter Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a longer interview with the Swedish woman.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She not only talked about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: “There are a few things that surprised me,” she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: “How far people go to steer the focus away from the climate crisis,” she shook.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: “Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children is taking to the streets,” she experienced.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leaders who ridicule or even try to silence them on social media find her “funny” because they show her the reactions “because they have no other answer to that.”
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was addressed to a well-known scene in which she threw US President Trump a bitter evil eye behind.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN climate summit in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive view was captured by cameras and has since been seen by countless people online.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what was the 17-year-old thinking about the US president right now?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she responded only briefly and dry: “To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation”.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: Experienced satirist Colbert probably didn't expect the quick-witted answer and quickly disappeared from the picture laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her “how dare you?” -She remembered her speech on the principles of climate protection at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: after a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly upwards.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now bluesrock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Awesome guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: The band's co-founder Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members shared an official statement on Saturday, and another statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians like Peter Frampton recognized Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional response of a “monumental loss” for all previous and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the long-legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit “Albatross” remains unforgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life (“The End of the Game”, “In the Skies”) was like a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: Green experienced a rapid rise with Fleetwood Mac - but then the band celebrated their biggest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: There is said to have been a dispute, among other things, because Green wanted to donate all the Group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide garments and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Green left the band just three years after its foundation in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: It was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The bluesrock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: Green has been treated in psychiatry for a long time.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During most of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the streets temporarily, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent a time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 as the son of a Jewish working class family in London's Bethnal Green district.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: At a young age, he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: He learned the first guitar grips at the age of eleven.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager started playing guitar professionally and was given the chance five years later to be on stage as lead guitarist for instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was hired in the bluesbreakers to replace his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the middle of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac together with his bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie in the summer of 1967.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song “Albatross”, composed by Green, gave the group the first number 1 hit in winter 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green did not cope with the media hustle, and his experiments with the drug LSD became increasingly extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on the life between music and addiction in an interview: “The worst thing that happened to me in life is drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit.”
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green was surprisingly successful in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac, meanwhile, swam on a wave of success in new formation without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Her album “Rumours”, released in 1977, sold more than 40 million times worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of friendly musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British “Daily Telegraph” spoke of a rock star returned to Earth at the time.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Drug-free, Green released a few albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band dissolved in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his soft sound, one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
